item.title: Alvin Bragg Opposes Trump’s Dismissal Motion
item.description: My hope is that common sense prevails.

item.title: ‘I Feel Betrayed’: Who Will Speak Up for the Israeli Women Held Hostage by Hamas?
item.description: In its campaign against gender-based violence, UN Women has all but ignored Hamas’s atrocities. Hostage families are speaking out.

item.title: The Affirmative Action Fight Comes to High Schools
item.description: The ‘Handicapper General’ interpretation of the equal protection clause must not stand.

item.title: Republicans Can Help Workers without Helping Unions
item.description: What America’s working class actually wants is for political leaders to pursue a pro-worker rather than a pro-union agenda.

item.title: Trump Should Swear Off Lawfare
item.description: He is right when he touts success as the best form of vengeance.
